attributes.action: Bring back the Metropolitan Police Box
attributes.additional_details: For the 50th anniversary of Doctor Who. Bring back the police box. It is an ancient part of British culture and is a thing that many people want back. For the 50th anniversary of the remarkable television series it would be a dream come true if  the police box popped up on streets.. not just for a day... or a week... but forever.  If you like Doctor Who please support me and if you want the police box back please support me ~The Blue Box from  "Trust me, I'm the Doctor"
